steps: Bend one pipe cleaner in half to form the legs.
Shape another pipe cleaner to form the body.
Move 1.5 inches (3.8 cm) from the tip of where the beak should be.
Use 2 pipe cleaners to enlarge the torso.
goal_state: ((position pc1 bent) (location pc1 partially_in_air) (position pc2 bent) (location pc2 on_pipe_cleaner) (shape tip shaped_to_form_beak) (location tip now_away_from_tip) (width torso now_wider) (weight torso heavier))

goal: Make Marshmallow Cream Cheese Fruit Dip
steps: Blend the cream cheese and marshmallow cream until combined.
Pour the mixture into a clean bowl.
Serve with fruit or whatever else you like.
Finished.
goal_state: ((combined cream_cheese marshmallow_cream) (in_container cream_cheese mixing_bowl) (in_container marshmallow_cream mixing_bowl) (full mixing_bowl) (sliced fruit))

steps: Firstly, lay out all the equipment you are going to use-whatever pattern it is.
Start with your rucksack, this is the biggest piece of your personal kit so needs the most camouflage.
Next, move on to the helmet.
Be careful with webbing.
Be extremely cautious when disguising your weapon.
Vehicles really need a vehicle camouflage net.
goal_state: ((laid_out my_equipment ground_surface) (organized my_rucksack) (organized my_helmet) (organized my_webbing) (organized my_weapon) (camouflaged my_rucksack) (camouflaged my_helmet) (camouflaged my_webbing) (camouflaged my_weapon) (carefully_disguised my_weapon) (netted my_vehicle my_camouflage_net))

steps: Simmer the rhubarb with the sugar, cloves and water.
Simmer until the rhubarb becomes soft.
Remove from the heat.
Add the mint leaves for decoration.
pddl: place_ingredients cloves rhubarb sugar water pot stove

goal: Make a Pitcher of Melon Pina Coladas
steps: Pour the ingredients (except the garnish) into a pitcher that can hold 100 ounces.
Ensure everything is mixed thoroughly.
Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
Pour the mixture into tall glasses.
Add a chunk of honeydew melon on the side of each glass.
Finished.
goal_state: ((in_glass mixture1 glass1) (garnished honeydew1 glass1) (on_table glass1) (empty pitcher1))

goal: Make Soap Bubbles for Your Children
steps: Mix soap and water.
Enhance your bubble solution.
Make a little bubble wand.
Make a giant bubble wand.
First go outside, since bubbles look most beautiful when the sun shines through their iridescent swirls.
Make giant bubbles.
pddl: mix_soap_and_water alice soap1 soap1 bowl1 mixture1
